prayer.title: 🕊️ Morning Prayer
prayer.modeh_ani: מודה אני לפניך — I gratefully thank You, living and eternal King, for returning my soul within me with compassion — great is Your faithfulness.
prayer.blessing: Blessed are You who gives strength to the weary and renews the spirit of the exhausted.
prayer.psalm: Psalm 118:25: "Lord, save us! Lord, grant us success!"
prayer.proverb: Proverbs 16:9: "The heart of man plans his way, but the Lord establishes his steps."
prayer.intention: Let my work today compound into something that outlasts me.
prayer.closing: May your work today be a pleasing offering. May your rest tonight be deep and restorative.

weather.title: ☀️ Weather — Temecula, CA
weather.summary: Beautiful sunny Monday — 81°F high. Patchy fog tonight. Rain likely Tuesday night through Wednesday (50% chance). Cooler midweek (62-69°F), clearing Thursday-Friday.

mre.title: 📊 MRE Trading
mre.signals_summary: All 9 assets on HOLD — no active BUY signals today

outliers.note: Tech in BEAR regime while broad market is BULL — potential weakness

mre.thesis: Fear at 43.8 — approaching buy zone but not triggered. Bull regime intact (SPY above all EMAs). All signals HOLD — patience. GLD and XLE showing strongest momentum. Tech (XLK) diverging bearish — watch for resolution.

family.title: 💛 Family Focus
recommendations: PRIORITY: Focus on repair. Acknowledge recent conflicts without defending.
Increase acts of service dramatically this week.
Create space for her to express frustrations without fixing.
family.action: Today's focus: Acts of service for Jillian. Start the week with repair, not retreat.

Milan-Cortina 2026 Winter Olympics underway — Day 2 of competition
US-Iran nuclear talks in Oman progressing — discussions reportedly limited to nuclear file only

China's robot makers spotlight AI-powered entertainment for Lunar New Year
